net.hudup.core.data

Class ExternalConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.PropList
      • net.hudup.core.data.DataConfig
        • net.hudup.core.data.SysConfig
          • net.hudup.core.data.ExternalConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TextParsable

    public class ExternalConfig
extends SysConfig
    This class specified the configuration including external information stored in outside database different from Hudup framework database. As a convention, this class is called external configuration which is often used by ExternalQuery.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • EXTERNAL_USERSQL_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String EXTERNAL_USERSQL_FIELD
        External user SQL field name. SQL, abbreviation of Structured Query Language, of is the formal language for accessing and operating on relation database. External user SQL is the SQL statement for retrieving users at outside database.

      • EXTERNAL_ITEMSQL_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String EXTERNAL_ITEMSQL_FIELD
        External item SQL field name. SQL, abbreviation of Structured Query Language, of is the formal language for accessing and operating on relation database. External item SQL is the SQL statement for retrieving items at outside database.

      • EXTERNAL_RATINGSQL_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String EXTERNAL_RATINGSQL_FIELD
        External rating SQL field name. SQL, abbreviation of Structured Query Language, of is the formal language for accessing and operating on relation database. External rating SQL is the SQL statement for retrieving ratings at outside database.

      • encrypt

        protected java.lang.String encrypt(HiddenText hidden)
        Description copied from class: PropList
        Extracting the plain internal text of specified HiddenText. Such plain text needs to be encrypted. This is the reason that the method is called "encrypt". However, in the current implementation, such returned plain text it is not encrypted yet.
        Overrides:
        encrypt in class PropList
        Parameters:
        hidden - Specified HiddenText.
        Returns:
        The plain internal text of specified HiddenText. Such plain text is encrypted if possible.

      • decrypt

        protected HiddenText decrypt(java.lang.String text)
        Description copied from class: PropList
        Wrapping the specified text by HiddenText. The specified text needs to be decrypted if it was encrypted before. This is the reason that the method is called "decrypt".
        Overrides:
        decrypt in class PropList
        Parameters:
        text - Specified text. It needs to be decrypted if it was encrypted before.
        Returns:
        HiddenText that wraps the specified text.
